document_data.mainbody:
Gelthoon Street was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Gelthoon Street was located in the southern section of Waterdeeps North Ward. Gelthoon Street branched south from Suldown Street and eventually ended on Golden Serpent Street. Other roads intersecting Gelthoon Street included Aveen Street and Brahiirs Street.
* Gost Villa
